description:
The Translator helps in understanding foreign languages. You can use it for translating texts, conversations, live speech, photos or web pages.

- 44 languages
- 3 translation engines
- ASR automatic speech recognition
- TTS text to speech
- OCR image translate
- Integrated image editor (crop, rotate, resize, filters)
- automatic language detection
- conversation translation, up to 4 languages simultaneously
- WEB translator


Supported languages:
Hebrew, Korean, Indonesian, Serbian, Haitian Creole, English US, Finnish, Dutch, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Italian, Greek, Catalan, Arabic, Hindi, Norwegian, Polish, Danish, Swedish, English UK, Chinese Traditional, Thai, Chinese Simplified, Lithuanian, Malay, Czech, Slovak, , Bulgarian, Slovenian, Latvian, German, Vietnamese, Romanian, Spanish, French, Ukrainian, Estonian, Albanian, Portuguese, Japanese, Macedonian, Croatian

Important 
This program is using your device's internet connection. If your internet contract has high data transfer fee, your internet bill also can be high.
trackCensoredName: Free Translator 4 - More than a dictionary - Translator
